Index.title: Welcome to Cocktail Voting
Index.description: Rate and vote for your favorite cocktails

Vote.title: Vote for Cocktail
Vote.alreadyVoted: You have already voted for this cocktail from this device
Vote.submitError: Error submitting vote. Please try again.

modal.alreadyVotedMessage: We've noticed that you've already rated this cocktail. To ensure fair voting, each person can only submit one rating per cocktail.
modal.errorMessage: We couldn't process your vote at this time. Please try again in a moment.
modal.emailError: We couldn't send the recipe to your email. Please check that the email address is correct and try again.

Vote.sendRecipe: Send the recipe of this cocktail to my email
